text: Tom Gilbey (19 May 1938 - 24 May 2017) was a British fashion designer associated with Savile Row tailoring of the 1960s. He was born in London, England. His designs have featured in the Fashion Museum, Bath, and are in the collections of the Victoria & Albert Museum and the Museum of London. Gilbey died of cancer on 24 May in London at the age of 79. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1938 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in London Category:British fashion designers Category:People from London
title: Tom Gilbey (designer)
